Description: Unique identifier of each subscription

The date on which the subscription was observed to calculate the features in the dataset. It was chosen at random amongst all the dates between the start of the subscription and the end of the subscription (before cancellation)
TRAINING SET ONLY! 0 = the learner cancelled their subscription before next payment, 1 = the learner made an additional payment in this subscription
Unique identifier of a specialization (each subscription gives a learner access to a particular specialization)
number of courses in the specialization
primary domain of the specialization (Computer Science, Data Science, etc.)
BOOLEAN for whether the specialization is a "professional certicate" (a special type of specialization that awards completers with an industry-sponsored credential)
BOOLEAN for whether the specialization is a "gateway certificate" (a special type of specialization geared towards learners starting in a new field)
Days from coursera registration date to the date on which the observation is made
the region of the world that the learner is from (United States, East Asia, etc.)
the reported gender of the learner (if not available, then "unknown")
Other courses (not in this specialization) in which the learner was active prior to observation_dt
Other courses (not in this specialization) in which the learner was active prior to observation_dt and was a paid enrollee
Items completed in other courses (not in this specialization) prior to the observation_dt
Items completed in other courses (not in this specialization) prior to the observation_dt, where the learner was a paid enrollee
Other payments that the learner made on Coursera separate from this subscription
US Dollar estimate of other payments that the learner made on Coursera separate from this subscription
An index of the "month" of the subcription; 1 = first month of payment, 2 = second month of payment
Days since the last payment in the subscription
Days until the next payment in the subsciption is due
Courses in the subscription specialization that were enrolled prior to the start of this subscription period
Courses in the subscription specialization that were completed prior to the start of this subscription period
Courses in the subscription specialization that were active prior to the start of this subscription period
Items in the subscription specialization that were completed prior to the start of the subscription period
Graded items (assignments) in the subscription speciallzation that were completed prior to the start of the subscription period
BOOLEAN for whether or not the subscription started with a free trial (7-day period for the learner to sample the specialization before paying)
Courses in the subscription specialization that were enrolled during this subscription period (before observation_dt)
Courses in the subscription specialization that were completed during this subscription period (before observation_dt)
Courses in the subscription specialization that were active during this subscription period (before observation_dt)
Items in the subscription specialization that were completed during this subscription period (before observation_dt)
Graded items (assignments) in the subscription speciallzation that were completed during this subscription period (before observation_dt)

BOOLEAN for whether the learner was active in a capstone course during this subscription period. The last course in some specializations is called a "captone" course as allows the learner to apply the skills they have learned in the prior courses up to that point.
Hours spent learning in subscription specialization courses prior to the subscription period
Hours spent learning in subscription specialization courses during the subscription period (before observation_dt)
Days active in the subscription specialization prior to the subscription period
Days active thus far in the subscription period (before observation_dt)
Days since the most recent activity date in the subscription (if never active, defaults to the number of days since the start of the subscription)
